DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study investigate 6 month resveratrol supplementation improve glucose tolerance overweight/obese individual . As secondary objective want investigate whether rest energy metabolism , intra-hepatic lipid content , physical performance , body composition quality life change 6 month resveratrol supplementation individual .
DOC.criteria: Men age 4070 year postmenopausal woman age 5070 year BMI : 2735 kg/m2 Stable dietary habit : weight gain loss > 5kg last three month Willingness limit consumption resveratrolcontaining food product willingness refrain use resveratrol contain supplement Subjects include dependent medical doctor study approve participation evaluate data obtain screen Uncontrolled hypertension HbA1c > 6.5 % Previously diagnose type 2 diabetes Medication use know interfere glucose homeostasis/metabolism Current alcohol consumption > 20 gram alcohol/day Subjects want inform unexpected medical finding screen /study , wish physician inform , participate study . Participation another biomedical study within 1 month start intervention Any condition , disease abnormal laboratory test result , opinion Investigator , would interfere study outcome , affect trial participation put subject undue risk
